data.name: Esteban Danilo Diaz Riascos
data.Profile: I am a software developer, started in this great profession from the university, I have participated in marathons and hackathons reaching international instances, being part of large development companies, getting involved in sectors such as financial, legal, retail, among others.

experience.jobDescription: Holding the position of frontend developer, working mainly on projects in the housing sector.
Occupying the position of full stack developer, working mainly on banking projects, retails, among others.
Holding the position of junior development engineer, working mainly on judicial projects.
